definition: pillar
pillar/CL:根[gen1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Shi

sentences.english: I should like to call him a pillar of society.
sentences.chinese: 我要稱他爲社會的柱石。

sentences.english: The thermoluminescence strengths and peak temperatures of beryls can be regarded as the typomorphic characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 綠柱石的熱釋光強度和峯溫可作爲其標型特徵之一。

sentences.english: It is the next generation now in Pammal church.
sentences.chinese: 我們寄望巴瑪下一代的信徒能成爲教會的柱石。

sentences.english: Our army is the mainstay of the dictatorship of the proletariat in China.
sentences.chinese: 我們的軍隊是無產階級專政的柱石。

sentences.english: Beryl's is after all more than just another manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 綠柱石的畢竟是多隻是另一個製造商。

sentences.english: Facts have proved that China has already become a strong pillar of maintaining world peace.
sentences.chinese: 事實證明，中國已成爲維護世界和平的堅強柱石。

sentences.english: Self-confidence and self-reliance are the mainstays of a strong character.
sentences.chinese: 自信與自力是堅強品格的柱石。

sentences.english: Ilvaite is a rare mineral of calcium-iron-bearing silicate.
sentences.chinese: 黑柱石是一種少見的含鈣鐵硅酸鹽礦物。

sentences.english: You might not even realize that beryl comes in other colors.
sentences.chinese: 你可能不知道，即使是在其他綠柱石顏色。

sentences.english: Andalusite is a polymorph with two other minerals, Kyanite and Sillimanite.
sentences.chinese: 紅柱石屬多晶型物，含藍晶石和硅線石兩種不同礦物。

sentences.english: In the paper, the distribution of mineral resources, properties, and prospect of application about andalusite were introduced .
sentences.chinese: 簡述了紅柱石的礦產資源分佈狀況及其特性。

sentences.english: Beryl is, when absolutely pure, totally devoid of color.
sentences.chinese: 絕對純淨的綠柱石完全無色。

sentences.english: Second, The Times are the mainstays of a paper.
sentences.chinese: 第二，時期是一篇論文的柱石。

sentences.english: God's family is the church of the living God, the pillar and foundation of the truth.
sentences.chinese: 這家就是永生神的教會，真理的柱石和根基。

definition: trusted aide
ridgepole/ridgepole and beams/person able to bear heavy responsibility/mainstay (of organization)/pillar (of state)
loyal and brave
secure as a city protected by a wall of metal and a moat of boiling water (idiom)/well fortified/invulnerable to attack
to display utter loyalty/to be loyal to the end
state/country/the Gods of earth and grain
to bring peace and stability to the country
to meet with disaster/killed/in the clutches of the enemy/to fall foul of/in danger
to collapse/to topple/to capsize
to inspire awe throughout the empire (idiom)
in danger of collapse/in a parlous state/(of person) treacherous
precarious as pile of eggs (idiom); ready to fall and break at any moment/in a dangerous state
lit. red-bellied devotion (idiom); wholehearted loyalty/to serve sb with body and soul
to suppress rebellion and quell unrest/to bring calm and order to/calm and peaceful/tranquil
to cast in metal/(fig.) to forge/to fashion
to guard/to protect
